search.query: | inputlookup mitre_lookup.csv | join "dummy" type=left [| rest /services/configs/conf-analyticstories | where annotations!="" | spath input=annotations path=mitre_attack{} output=mitre_attack | eval rule_name=ltrim(title,"savedsearch://") | fields rule_name,mitre_attack | mvexpand mitre_attack | fields title,rule_name,mitre_attack | join rule_name [ search `notable` | search $urgency_field$ | rename search_name as rule_name | eval notable_asset = coalesce(src,dest,user,"unknown") | fields rule_name, urgency, notable_asset | lookup urgency_score.csv urgency | stats max(score) as max_score, count by rule_name, notable_asset] | stats sum(count) as triggered_count list(rule_name) as rule_name_list by mitre_attack, max_score delim=";" | nomv rule_name_list | outputlookup mitre_notable_results.csv]

| lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Collection" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Collection Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Collection Rule Name List", max_score as "Collection Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Collection","Collection Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Collection Attack Count", "Collection Max Score" | eval "Collection"='Collection'. "|" .'Collection Attack Count'. "|" .'Collection Rule Name List'. "|" .'Collection Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Command And Control" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Command And Control Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Command And Control Rule Name List", max_score as "Command And Control Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Command And Control","Command And Control Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Command And Control Attack Count", "Command And Control Max Score" | eval "Command And Control"='Command And Control'. "|" .'Command And Control Attack Count'. "|" .'Command And Control Rule Name List'. "|" .'Command And Control Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Credential Access" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Credential Access Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Credential Access Rule Name List", max_score as "Credential Access Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Credential Access","Credential Access Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Credential Access Attack Count", "Credential Access Max Score" | eval "Credential Access"='Credential Access'. "|" .'Credential Access Attack Count'. "|" .'Credential Access Rule Name List'. "|" .'Credential Access Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Defense Evasion" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Defense Evasion Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Defense Evasion Rule Name List", max_score as "Defense Evasion Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Defense Evasion","Defense Evasion Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Defense Evasion Attack Count", "Defense Evasion Max Score" | eval "Defense Evasion"='Defense Evasion'. "|" .'Defense Evasion Attack Count'. "|" .'Defense Evasion Rule Name List'. "|" .'Defense Evasion Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Discovery" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Discovery Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Discovery Rule Name List", max_score as "Discovery Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Discovery","Discovery Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Discovery Attack Count", "Discovery Max Score" | eval "Discovery"='Discovery'. "|" .'Discovery Attack Count'. "|" .'Discovery Rule Name List'. "|" .'Discovery Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Execution" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Execution Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Execution Rule Name List", max_score as "Execution Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Execution","Execution Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Execution Attack Count", "Execution Max Score" | eval "Execution"='Execution'. "|" .'Execution Attack Count'. "|" .'Execution Rule Name List'. "|" .'Execution Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Exfiltration" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Exfiltration Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Exfiltration Rule Name List", max_score as "Exfiltration Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Exfiltration","Exfiltration Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Exfiltration Attack Count", "Exfiltration Max Score" | eval "Exfiltration"='Exfiltration'. "|" .'Exfiltration Attack Count'. "|" .'Exfiltration Rule Name List'. "|" .'Exfiltration Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Impact" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Impact Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Impact Rule Name List", max_score as "Impact Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Impact","Impact Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Impact Attack Count", "Impact Max Score" | eval "Impact"='Impact'. "|" .'Impact Attack Count'. "|" .'Impact Rule Name List'. "|" .'Impact Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Initial Access" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Initial Access Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Initial Access Rule Name List", max_score as "Initial Access Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Initial Access","Initial Access Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Initial Access Attack Count", "Initial Access Max Score" | eval "Initial Access"='Initial Access'. "|" .'Initial Access Attack Count'. "|" .'Initial Access Rule Name List'. "|" .'Initial Access Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Lateral Movement" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Lateral Movement Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Lateral Movement Rule Name List", max_score as "Lateral Movement Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Lateral Movement","Lateral Movement Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Lateral Movement Attack Count", "Lateral Movement Max Score" | eval "Lateral Movement"='Lateral Movement'. "|" .'Lateral Movement Attack Count'. "|" .'Lateral Movement Rule Name List'. "|" .'Lateral Movement Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Persistence" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Persistence Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Persistence Rule Name List", max_score as "Persistence Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Persistence","Persistence Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Persistence Attack Count", "Persistence Max Score" | eval "Persistence"='Persistence'. "|" .'Persistence Attack Count'. "|" .'Persistence Rule Name List'. "|" .'Persistence Max Score' | lookup mitre_notable_results.csv mitre_attack as "Privilege Escalation" OUTPUTNEW triggered_count as "Privilege Escalation Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Privilege Escalation Rule Name List", max_score as "Privilege Escalation Max Score" | fillnull value="NULL" "Privilege Escalation","Privilege Escalation Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Privilege Escalation Attack Count", "Privilege Escalation Max Score" | eval "Privilege Escalation"='Privilege Escalation'. "|" .'Privilege Escalation Attack Count'. "|" .'Privilege Escalation Rule Name List'. "|" .'Privilege Escalation Max Score'

| rest /services/configs/conf-analyticstories | where annotations!="" | spath input=annotations path=mitre_attack{} output=mitre_attack | eval rule_name=ltrim(title,"savedsearch://") | fields rule_name,mitre_attack | mvexpand mitre_attack | fields title,rule_name,mitre_attack | join rule_name [ search `notable` | search $urgency_field$ | rename search_name as rule_name | eval notable_asset = coalesce(src,dest,user,"unknown") | fields rule_name, urgency, notable_asset | lookup urgency_score.csv urgency | stats max(score) as max_score, count by rule_name, notable_asset] | stats sum(count) as triggered_count list(rule_name) as rule_name_list by mitre_attack, max_score, notable_asset delim=";"

| eventstats sum("Collection Attack Count") as "Collection Total" | eventstats sum("Command And Control Attack Count") as "Command And Control Total" | eventstats sum("Credential Access Attack Count") as "Credential Access Total" | eventstats sum("Defense Evasion Attack Count") as "Defense Evasion Total" | eventstats sum("Discovery Attack Count") as "Discovery Total" | eventstats sum("Execution Attack Count") as "Execution Total" | eventstats sum("Exfiltration Attack Count") as "Exfiltration Total" | eventstats sum("Impact Attack Count") as "Impact Total" | eventstats sum("Initial Access Attack Count") as "Initial Access Total" | eventstats sum("Lateral Movement Attack Count") as "Lateral Movement Total" | eventstats sum("Persistence Attack Count") as "Persistence Total" | eventstats sum("Privilege Escalation Attack Count") as "Privilege Escalation Total"
| fields "Collection Total","Command And Control Total","Credential Access Total","Defense Evasion Total","Discovery Total","Execution Total","Exfiltration Total","Impact Total","Initial Access Total","Lateral Movement Total","Persistence Total","Privilege Escalation Total" | dedup "Collection Total","Command And Control Total","Credential Access Total","Defense Evasion Total","Discovery Total","Execution Total","Exfiltration Total","Impact Total","Initial Access Total","Lateral Movement Total","Persistence Total","Privilege Escalation Total"
| stats values(triggered_count) as "Total Attack Count", list(mitre_attack) as mitre_attack_list by notable_asset delim="; " | nomv mitre_attack_list | rename mitre_attack_list as "Attack Techniques"

| fields "Collection","Command And Control","Credential Access","Defense Evasion","Discovery","Execution","Exfiltration","Impact","Initial Access","Lateral Movement","Persistence","Privilege Escalation"

table.fields: ["Collection","Command And Control","Credential Access","Defense Evasion","Discovery","Execution","Exfiltration","Impact","Initial Access","Lateral Movement","Persistence","Privilege Escalation"]
